#  Checklist - Onboarding Collaborators 

## Collaborator Checklist

New collaborators should:

- [ ] Review and sign the _Data Use Agreement_  
- [ ] Review the _Authorship Guidelines_ (@sec-authorship_process)  
- [ ] add required information to _Collaborator Contact Information_ file  

  - [ ] orcid id   
  - [ ] link to github account  
  - [ ] email  
  - [ ] provide "expertise keywords"   


## Admin Checklist

HerbVar Admins then grant access to the following as appropriate: 

- [ ] Slack  
- [ ] HerbVar [Zotero Library](https://www.zotero.org/groups/5539815/herbvar)  
- [ ] Github Access
